cards.title: Legion
setup: At the start of the game, {Legion} enters play “Nanotech Master Criminal“ side up.
Put 3 “Nanite Swarm“ cards under this card. Shuffle the other 2 into the villain deck.
gameplay: At the end of the villain turn, {Legion} deals the hero with the most equipment cards in play {H}-2 melee damage and destroys one of their equipment cards.
When a Nanite Swarm would enter play, place it under this card. Nanite Swarms under this card are indestructible.
When {Legion} flips to this side, restore him to an amount of health equal to the number of cards under this card times 10.
When {Legion} would be destroyed, flip this card.
If there are no Nanite Swarms under this card, the heroes win the game.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
flippedGameplay: When {Legion} flips to this side, put all Nanite Swarms under {Legion} into play.
{Legion} is indestructible and immune to all damage.
When a Nanite Swarm is destroyed, put all Nanite Swarms from play under this card, then {Legion} flips.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
challengeText: {Legion}'s max HP is 50. All 5 Nanite Swarms begin play beneath this card.

openingLines.default: I am Legion, for we are many!

cards.title: Nanite Swarm
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage and gains 2 HP.
cards.flavorText: There's too many of them! We have to cut them off at the source!

cards.title: Constructed Plasma Turret
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the second lowest HP {H}-1 energy damage.

cards.title: Nanite Trap
cards.body: The first time each turn this card takes damage, it deals the source of that damage 2 melee damage. Targets dealt damage this way cannot deal damage until the start of the villain turn.

cards.title: Hacked Vault Door
cards.body: Reduce damage taken by this card by 1. Redirect all damage dealt to villain targets to this card. When this card is dealt damage, one player may discard 2 cards. If they do, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Sealed so tightly not even I could get in or out. Enjoy yourselves, heroes, until your air runs out!

cards.title: Lethal Ambush
cards.body: {Legion} deals the hero target with the lowest HP H-2 energy damage. If they have 10 or less HP remaining, increase this damage by 2.
cards.flavorText: What're you doing over here all alone?

cards.title: Devour Tech
cards.body: Destroy a hero equipment card. Search the villain deck for a Nanite Swarm and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: Any metal he touches, he can turn into more of himself! We need to stop this before it gets out of control!

cards.title: Creeping Assault
cards.body: {Legion} deals the hero with the highest HP {H} projectile damage. That hero's player discards a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I see you're behind me now.
How do you see anything with that blindfold on?

cards.title: Hungry Nanoblades
cards.body: {Legion} deals the {H}-1 hero targets with the highest HP 2 melee damage each. Increase damage dealt to those targets by 1 until the start of the villain turn.
cards.flavorText: Those blades can chew through any metal! Watch out!

cards.title: Prey on Weakness
cards.body: Destroy H-2 ongoing cards. {Legion} deals each hero without any ongoing cards in play {H}-1 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: I am mechanical perfection! You are just flawed organics!

cards.title: Nanite Barrage
cards.body: {Legion} deals the hero target with the second highest HP X projectile damage, where X is the number of devices in play.
